titles.title: Learning Excellence and Good Examples from New Developers Act of 2019
LEGEND Act of 2019
Learning Excellence and Good Examples from New Developers Act of 2019
LEGEND Act of 2019
Learning Excellence and Good Examples from New Developers Act of 2020
LEGEND Act of 2020
Learning Excellence and Good Examples from New Developers Act of 2020
A bill to require the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration to make certain operational models available to the public, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

calendar.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation. Reported by Senator Wicker with an amendment. With written report No. 116-253.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 514.

action.text: Measure laid before Senate by unanimous consent.
The committee amendment withdrawn by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent.

reference.label: text of amendment in the nature of a substitute

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary:
Learning Excellence and Good Examples from New Developers Act of 2019 or the LEGEND Act of 2019
This bill requires the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) to make certain operational models available to the public and periodically review innovations and improvements made to such models in order to improve the accuracy and timeliness of NOAA forecasts.
